title: Dwarf planet Ceres
description: This image, taken by NASA's Dawn spacecraft, shows dwarf planet Ceres from an altitude of 2,700 miles (4,400 kilometers). The image, with a resolution of 1,400 feet (410 meters) per pixel, was taken on June 24, 2015.
theme:
LIFELESS. Desert lands — if you value still
and silent beauty of the cosmos
